reviews.productTitle: Lutron Caseta 3 Way Smart Dimmer Switch Kit, w/ Wireless 3 way Pico Remote and Bracket, Light Switch for LED Lights, No Neutral Required, P-PKG1WB-WH
reviews.text: These are great. I purchased an expensive chandelier for my family room and the electrician wanted almost 1k to wire it. Instead I purchased the plug in Lutron Castia smart plug and wired it in my attic back in 2005 I use a Pico remote in my family room to turn it on and off. It still works perfectly and saved me a lot for install costs. I have all of the primary lights on these switches now so I can turn them on and off automatically.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 6, 2025
reviews.title: Quality hardware, great purchase.

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Caseta 3 Way Smart Dimmer Switch Kit, w/ Wireless 3 way Pico Remote and Bracket, Light Switch for LED Lights, No Neutral Required, P-PKG1WB-WH
reviews.text: I love Lutron products and how well they integrate with Alexa. Now can turn on/off all of my lights in house via Alexa while sitting in my easy chair, or light up my house over the internet while I'm away. Great system. BUT, don't be fooled with their propaganda that light switches are "easy to install". Even if you're knowledgeably about "neutral wires", etc, the instructions will NOT really help you if you've got anything other than a plain vanilla install. The instructions for the wall switch are really for the Pico remote. And in my case, I had 5 wires coming into my old swtch, but the instructions only are relevant for 4 wires. And don't expect their YouTube videos to help much either. They are redundant and not relevant. But after spending 3 hours, I was able to install the new dimmer switch and add it and two Pico remotes to my existing Lutron Caseta system. And I love it!!!!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2025
reviews.title: Great product, once you figure out how to install it!

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Caseta 3 Way Smart Dimmer Switch Kit, w/ Wireless 3 way Pico Remote and Bracket, Light Switch for LED Lights, No Neutral Required, P-PKG1WB-WH
reviews.text: The description on Amazon says: "For Alexa, Apple Homekit, Google Home (Hub Required)" I had no intention of using any of these. I just wanted to use the app on my phone. So I didn't think a hub was required. The directions say otherwise. This should be made clear on this page. I think way more people will want to use the app than the other devices so it should absolutely be inuded in options the need a hub in the description.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2025
reviews.title: Requires additional device to control with phone app

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Caseta 3 Way Smart Dimmer Switch Kit, w/ Wireless 3 way Pico Remote and Bracket, Light Switch for LED Lights, No Neutral Required, P-PKG1WB-WH
reviews.text: Just recently switch to Lutron product line, and my fan switch install went flawless. I installed this switch on my outdoor lights and learned a lot along the way. Hopefully this will help someone else. - When I installed the switch, I have neutral wires in my gangboxes (house built in 2000), and was shocked that this switch didn't have a neutral connection. You don't need it for this switch, which is great for those that don't have the wire, but it was a first for me as my Zwave switches always needed it - Switch was installed correctly, but had no lights on the switch itself, and while I noticed my outdoor porch lights were showing a dimly lit bulb, hitting the on or off on the switch did nothing. I was convinced initially it was wiring, but lo and behold, the true issue was the bulbs that I installed. I had purchased some cheap no-name brand LED bulbs and they were not dimmable (I think). Upon changing the bulb, the switch showed operational lights, and everything worked fine. In my two fixtures, I initially only changed one, and that was all it took to get it working. I confirmed the same issue when I installed another switch for my 3 deck post lights. Changing a bulb to a dimmable bulb (while I wait for matching replacements) was all I needed to do to get it to work! - Pico remotes are amazing, and can be used for many different things. Love that I don't need hardwired Z-wave accessory switches anymore, and these make it so less crowded in a multi-gangbox! Highly recommend those looking to make the switch from Zwave, WiFi and other lower quality switches. I will say my Zwave installation was flawless in operation, but ultimately got sick of the low quality and frequent failures. Anyone considering a "WiFi" switch should not do so, but I'm not going to gain much in functionality over my Zwave switches, the reliability and Picos are the big pluses.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2024
reviews.title: New to Lutron (but have 24 years of automated light switches) - Learned Some Important Things..

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Caseta 3 Way Smart Dimmer Switch Kit, w/ Wireless 3 way Pico Remote and Bracket, Light Switch for LED Lights, No Neutral Required, P-PKG1WB-WH

So I paid for this twice... OUCH. One out of 50 ain't bad.

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Caseta 3 Way Smart Dimmer Switch Kit, w/ Wireless 3 way Pico Remote and Bracket, Light Switch for LED Lights, No Neutral Required, P-PKG1WB-WH
reviews.text: I have used these on remodels for customers but first in my own home. Our dining room light should have been wired with a 3-way switch, I even had the wall opened at one point on one side, but where the switch was on the other side, I would have had to tear that wall open too, in order to feed 14 3-wire to it. With this dimmer and Pico dimmer problem solved in 20 minutes if replacing a one gang switch with the dimmer and mounting the remote on a wall by itself. My set up took longer because I changed out 3 toggle switches for all deco switches. So had to install all deco wall plates; one a 2 gang the other a 4gang (Pico) remote. Pricing was good as well Box stores sell this kit in store for the same price, but it does not include the wall bracket. They charge an addition 8 for it. Shipping incredibly fast, ordered it in the box store late afternoon was at my door by 10:54 am. the next day. I COULD NOT find in the included instruction sheets how to pair it. But simple Press and hold off button on wired switch till lights blink, release. Press and hold off button on remote till lights blink 3 times on wired unit, release done. You can add a hub so you can have voice activation I don't need that just glad we now have switches on both sides of the dining room.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.title: Expensive but cheaper than an electrican!

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Caseta 3 Way Smart Dimmer Switch Kit, w/ Wireless 3 way Pico Remote and Bracket, Light Switch for LED Lights, No Neutral Required, P-PKG1WB-WH
reviews.text: I used to use the Maestro switches (with remote), but they didn’t work once I changed to LED bulbs. I don’t always have neutrals available (power runs to the light and then to the switch instead of vice versa), so I can’t use the smart switches. I put one in my husband’s office; he likes to be able to dim the lights remotely. I have another in the bedroom (with two remotes). This allows us to turn off (or on) the bedroom light from bed without having things rewired to install four-way switches. I have a third in the laundry room; the room is inconveniently designed because it’s under the stairs, and my storage shelf covered the light switch— so, I installed a Caseta switch and put a remote on an uncovered wall area. This is a much cheaper solution than having someone custom-build a cabinet for my under-stair storage wall, and, so far, it’s been great. There are probably other places I could put this, but, if I don’t need a remote, I prefer the slider on the Diva dimmer switch.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.title: I bought these for multiple rooms

This remote works through the wall and I can set it to go to the proper level for watching movies by hitting one button. Easy to operate. reviews.productTitle: Lutron Caseta 3 Way Smart Dimmer Switch Kit, w/ Wireless 3 way Pico Remote and Bracket, Light Switch for LED Lights, No Neutral Required, P-PKG1WB-WH
reviews.text: I planned to add a light to my out door garage. It is more than 30 feet from my smart hub pro. The hub pro will not pick the new wall switch up. The Pico remote will work but not a single smart feature is available. The Pico remote while registered with the Lutron App cannot be used in a smart mode through the App. This system is a high-tech rip off. THIRTY FEET is the MAX distance to talk to the switch. It is definitely a product from yester year. I have the wireless extender also. After a extended search I found a link to using the first plug-in dimmer as a range extender. This solved the problem.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.title: Worthless if more than 30 feet from smart hub

reviews.text: These are the best! You can control your lights from a different part of the house without having to run wires!! Our electrician told us about these and I'm obsessed. We bought two and put them on our side of the house to control lights on an addition that we just added. It was the perfect solution! They are easy to install, just like a light switch, and I actually get excited to push the buttons, they just have a good feel to them. You can program your dimmer setting as well, which is a really nice feature. I highly recommend these instead of running wires! Super easy!

reviews.title: This made life so much easier!
